question: Arica and Tom found 11 red balloons and 7 blue balloons. Find the total number of balloons.
Next they found 13 yellow streamers and 11 green streamers. Find the total streamers.
Arica made 24 candy bags and Tom made 21 candy bags. Find the total number of candy bags.
Mrs. Green has some toys and plans to buy more. Find the total number of toys.
Tom sold 56 tickets And Lily sold 30 tickets. Find the total number of tickets.
There are some food stalls, and they plan to add more. Find the total number of food stalls.
Arica and Tom are responsible for putting up posters. Find the total number of posters put by them.
They decided to put on games for the carnival. Find the total number of games.
Find the total number of volunteers in the carnival by adding the given numbers.
They have 16 tables and order 23 more. Find the total number of tables.
